name: @alexsasharegan/keycodes
description: A set of named constants mapping to event keycodes.

scripts.build: npm run build-dev && BABEL_ENV=production babel src -o ./dist/index.min.js
scripts.patch: npm run build && npm version patch
scripts.minor: npm run build && npm version minor
scripts.major: npm run build && npm version major

author: Alex Regan <alex.joseph.regan@gmail.com> (https://github.com/alexsasharegan)
